description: This registry is a list of file names which are used to help the randomizer find everything it needs

nodes.description: A Node is a point on an abstract graph, representing a particular location.

keys.description: A Key is a flag which gets added to the state. Usually represents unlocks or items that are distributed.

flags.description: A Flag is a Key, but may contain or require additional, more complext logic, or provide macros for 'keys' to use.
